titleStmt.title: Divisions cut in pieces by the svvord of the Lord: or, A discourse on a text of Scripture, of the unlawfulness of divisions in the Church of God, upon the highest pretences whatsoever. By John Rocket, minister of the Word at Hickling in Nottingham-shire.
titleStmt.author: Rocket, John.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Thomas Maxey, in Thames Street, neer Benets Pauls-wharfe Church,
